fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Energy, Business and Industry, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Kitemill is currently following the process regarding EU Innovation Fund. While the Innovation Fund can in principle finance Airborne Wind Energy (AWE) projects already according to the current draft plans, since “Next generation wind turbines” are included as eligible technology, we would like to try to bring more emphasis on AWE as a key breakthrough renewable energy technology
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Kitemill is a turbine supplier which develops next generation wind turbines within the field Airborne Wind Energy. 
 
Airborne Wind Energy will make wind power take a larger part of the global energy  mix than otherwice possible. This is because Airborne Wind system allow haveresting of wind in higher altitude where the wind conditions are better everywhere, thus open up new larger geographical markets ealier not viable for wind power.
